title: Assign Permission Sets with Existence Check
overview: Automatically assign the specified Permission Set to all active users with a Profile of “Standard User” or “System Administrator”—only if they haven't received it yet. The process scans these users, verifies whether the Permission Set is already assigned, and adds it when missing, maintaining consistent access without duplicate assignments.
